title: Resveratrol's bibliometric and visual analysis from 2014 to 2023.
abstract: Resveratrol (RSV) is a natural polyphenolic compound derived from a variety of plants that possesses a wide range of biological activities, including antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, antitumor, antibacterial, antiviral, anti-aging, anti-radiation damage, anti-apoptosis, immune modulation, regulation of glucolipid metabolism, inhibition of lipid deposition, and anti-neuro. It is therefore considered a promising drug with the potential to treat a wide range of diseases.
